import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { Modal, Container, Row, Col, Button, Form, Table } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { getDayShortName } from '../helpers' const moment = require('moment') const EmployeeModal = (props) => { setModalShow(false) } size="lg"> Panel - { employees[ modalEmployeeKey ]?.signature } Dane personalne: dispatch({ type: 'EMPLOYEE_UPDATE', id: modalEmployeeKey, field: 'signature', value: e.target.value })}/> Wymiar czasu pracy: dispatch({ type: 'EMPLOYEE_UPDATE', id: modalEmployeeKey, field: 'time_contract', value: e.target.value })} custom> Stanowisko: dispatch({ type: 'EMPLOYEE_UPDATE', id: modalEmployeeKey, field: 'role', value: e.target.value.toUpperCase() })}/> } const ScheduleCell = React.memo((props) => { return ( ) }); const ScheduleRow = React.memo((props) => { const dates = useSelector( state => state.dates ); return ( { props.no } { props.employee.signature } { dates.map(date => { return ( )}) } ) }) function Schedule() { const [modalShow, setModalShow] = useState(false); const [modalEmployeeKey, setModalEmployeeKey] = useState(0) const dispatch = useDispatch(); const { schedules } = useSelector( state => state.schedules ); const dates = useSelector( state => state.dates ); const employees = useSelector( state => state.employees ); return ( <> setModalShow(false) } size="lg"> Panel - { employees[ modalEmployeeKey ]?.signature } Dane personalne: dispatch({ type: 'EMPLOYEE_UPDATE', id: modalEmployeeKey, field: 'signature', value: e.target.value })}/> Wymiar czasu pracy: dispatch({ type: 'EMPLOYEE_UPDATE', id: modalEmployeeKey, field: 'time_contract', value: e.target.value })} custom> Stanowisko: dispatch({ type: 'EMPLOYEE_UPDATE', id: modalEmployeeKey, field: 'role', value: e.target.value.toUpperCase() })}/> { dates.map(date => { return ( )}) } { Object.entries(employees).map(([key, employee], i) => { return ( )})} { dates.map(date => { return ( )}) }
# Pracownik { moment(date).format('MM-DD') }
{ getDayShortName( moment(date).format('ddd').toLowerCase() ) }
# { ( e.key === 'Enter' ) ? (() => { dispatch({ type: 'EMPLOYEE_CREATE', value: e.target.value }); e.target.value = ""; })() : (() => {})() } }/>
); } export default Schedule;
